basic.color: Flower color white or pink, leaf color yellow green , red

maintenance.soil: Likes moisture, best planted in sphagnum moss
maintenance.sunlight: Likes moderate sunshine, suitable in places with bright scattered light and high humidity environments
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, do not spray water on leaves
maintenance.fertilization: May nourish itself by capturing insects, for better appearance, apply liquid fertilizers at 1/4-1/5 recommanded strength on leaves in each month
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten leaves timely
